mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO feeds(id, userId, title, content, publicScope, date, good) VALUES
(#{item.userId}, #{item.title}, #{item.content}, #{item.publicScope}, #{item.date}, #{item.good})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE good = VALUES(good)

INSERT INTO goods(id, feedId, userId) VALUES
(#{feedId}, #{userId})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE userId = VALUES(userId)

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM goods WHERE feedId = #{feedId} AND userId = #{userId}
